University of Chicago | Full Stack Engineers | Full-time | Chicago, IL | ONSITE | https://cdis.uchicago.edu/careers

Building petabyte-scale production data commons for data-driven research in cancer, birth defects, post traumatic stress disorder, and AIDS used by the broader scientific community. We believe in open-source, open access data, and open science.

The ideal candidate will be a python expert and have some experience in databases, data structures, cloud technologies, and microservices.

Tech We Use: Python, Go, PostgreSQL, OpenStack, AWS/GCP/Azure, Kubernetes, Docker, Elasticsearch, git

https://github.com/uc-cdis
